name: Sterus
description:
-- Game developed for Nintendo's handheld Game Boy Advance --

This game is in development, so a demo will be available for now, but soon the game will be officially released and will come with more content.

-- Tools --

Compiler for GBA: DevKitARM

Sprite Editor: Usenti

Map Editor: Tiled

Track Editor: OpenMPT

Help Content and Library: Tonc

-- Emulators --

Tested on emulators:

PC:  no$gba and mgba

Smartphones: myboy
